message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm trying to save as much as I can.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a great deal for you considering the product's value.  Let's meet in the middle.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,000. That's the highest I can go.
